00029 #include <libexif/exif-byte-order.h>
00030 #include <libexif/exif-log.h>
00031 
00032 typedef struct _ExifMnoteDataMethods ExifMnoteDataMethods;
00033 struct _ExifMnoteDataMethods {
00034 
00035         /* Live cycle */
00036         void (* free) (ExifMnoteData *);
00037 
00038         /* Modification */
00039         void (* save) (ExifMnoteData *, unsigned char **, unsigned int *);
00040         void (* load) (ExifMnoteData *, const unsigned char *, unsigned int);
00041         void (* set_offset)     (ExifMnoteData *, unsigned int);
00042         void (* set_byte_order) (ExifMnoteData *, ExifByteOrder);
00043 
00044         /* Query */
00045         unsigned int (* count)           (ExifMnoteData *);
00046         unsigned int (* get_id)          (ExifMnoteData *, unsigned int);
00047         const char * (* get_name)        (ExifMnoteData *, unsigned int);
00048         const char * (* get_title)       (ExifMnoteData *, unsigned int);
00049         const char * (* get_description) (ExifMnoteData *, unsigned int);
00050         char * (* get_value)             (ExifMnoteData *, unsigned int, char *val, unsigned int maxlen);
00051 };
00052 
00053 typedef struct _ExifMnoteDataPriv ExifMnoteDataPriv;
00054 
00055 struct _ExifMnoteData 
00056 {
00057         ExifMnoteDataPriv *priv;
00058 
00059         ExifMnoteDataMethods methods;
00060 
00061         /* Logging */
00062         ExifLog *log;
00063 
00064         /* Memory management */
00065         ExifMem *mem;
00066 };
00067
